entryPackExpired.title: Entry Pack Has Expired

entryPackArchived.title: Entry Pack Automatically Archived

backupCompleted.title: Data Backup Completed

confirmIgnore.title: Ignore Changes

info.title: Thailand Entry Guide
info.subtitle: Visa-free for 30 days for Chinese passport holders

visa.title: ‚úì Great News! Visa-Free Policy
items: Chinese passport visa-free for 30 days - spontaneous travel!
‚Ä¢ No visa application needed in advance
‚Ä¢ Valid for tourism, family visits, business purposes
‚Ä¢ New requirement: TDAC Digital Arrival Card must be submitted (can submit up to 72 hours before arrival)

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Entry Information
items: ‚Ä¢ TDAC submission timing: Can submit up to 72 hours before arrival, but must complete before arrival
‚Ä¢ QR code required: Must show TDAC QR code upon entry, can't find PDF is troublesome
‚Ä¢ High accuracy requirement: Any error in passport, flight, accommodation may affect entry
‚Ä¢ Immigration checks strict: Documents incomplete or answers unclear may trigger secondary inspection
‚Ä¢ Cloudflare verification: May encounter CAPTCHA challenges during submission

appFeatures.title: ‚ú® BorderBuddy Makes It Easy
items: ‚Ä¢ Zero anxiety: Auto-tracks itinerary, reminds you at the perfect time
‚Ä¢ Zero errors: Smart-fill TDAC, accurate information
‚Ä¢ Zero hassle: Enter once, we manage the entire process
‚Ä¢ QR code management: Auto-save TDAC QR code PDF, quick display upon entry

info.continueButton: Got it, continue to the checklist

requirements.introSubtitle: Fill in what you have and complete gradually

validPassport.title: Valid passport
validPassport.description: Passport valid for at least 6 months
validPassport.details: Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months from your entry date into Thailand.

onwardTicket.title: Return or onward ticket
onwardTicket.details: Provide confirmed flight booking showing you will leave Thailand within the authorized stay period.

accommodation.title: Accommodation proof
accommodation.description: Hotel booking or local contact information
accommodation.details: Provide hotel reservation confirmation or detailed contact information of friends/relatives in Thailand, including address and phone number.

funds.title: Sufficient funds
funds.description: Cash, credit cards, or bank statements
funds.details: Recommended to carry sufficient cash or show credit card/bank statements to prove adequate funds for your stay.

healthCheck.title: Health requirements
healthCheck.details: Verify any health requirements or documents needed for entry. Complete any required health declarations before arrival.

info.title: You can start filling anytime
info.subtitle: We support progressive completion of the checklist

hero.subtitle: Complete MDAC in 3 minutes, stress-free entry!
hero.beginnerTip: MDAC must be submitted within 3 days before arrival. We remind you at the perfect time.

validation.arrivalDateWithinWindow: Arrival date must be within the next 30 days to comply with MDAC submission window.

fieldHelp.middleName: Enter your middle name if applicable
fieldHelp.givenName: Enter your given name as shown on passport

info.title: Malaysia Entry Guide
info.subtitle: Visa-free for 30 days for Chinese passport holders

visa.title: ‚úì Great News! Visa-Free Policy
items: Since December 1, 2023, Chinese passport visa-free for 30 days - spontaneous travel!
‚Ä¢ No visa application needed in advance
‚Ä¢ Valid for tourism, family visits, business purposes
‚Ä¢ New requirement: MDAC Digital Arrival Card must be submitted (submission time limit applies)

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Entry Information
items: ‚Ä¢ MDAC has strict time limit: Submit too early = rejected, too late = can't make it
‚Ä¢ Time calculation error-prone: Must calculate by Malaysia time, timezone issues cause mistakes
‚Ä¢ PIN code easy to lose: Must show PIN upon entry, can't find email or lost screenshot is troublesome
‚Ä¢ CAPTCHA recognition difficult: Alphanumeric code unclear, multiple wrong attempts may get locked
‚Ä¢ High accuracy requirement: Any error in passport, flight, accommodation may affect entry

appFeatures.title: ‚ú® BorderBuddy Makes It Easy
items: ‚Ä¢ Zero anxiety: Auto-tracks itinerary, reminds you at the perfect time
‚Ä¢ Zero errors: Smart-fill MDAC, accurate information
‚Ä¢ Zero hassle: Enter once, we manage the entire process
‚Ä¢ PIN management: Auto-save PIN and confirmation email, quick display upon entry

requirements.introSubtitle: Fill in what you have and complete gradually

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport valid at least 6 months with blank pages
validPassport.details: Malaysia immigration requires your passport to remain valid >=6 months beyond your entry date. Renew before traveling if needed.

returnTicket.title: Return or onward ticket
returnTicket.details: Provide confirmed flight booking showing you will leave Malaysia within authorized stay period.

accommodation.title: Accommodation proof
accommodation.description: Hotel booking or local contact information
accommodation.details: Provide hotel reservation confirmation or detailed contact information of friends/relatives in Malaysia, including address and phone number.

sufficientFunds.title: Sufficient funds
sufficientFunds.description: Cash, credit cards, or bank statements
sufficientFunds.details: Recommended to carry sufficient cash or show credit card/bank statements to prove adequate funds for your stay.

success.subtitle: Next we will confirm your travel information.

smartFlow.title: Smart Flow (Guided)

features: Auto-fill with the info you've already saved in BorderBuddy

features: You type every field yourself on the MDAC portal
Need to calculate the Malaysia-time submission window manually

notes.title: Before you choose
items: MDAC only accepts submissions within 3 days before arrival (Malaysia time).
Smart Flow stores your submission proof and PIN for quick inspection.
Families can create one entry pack and submit every traveler together.

info.title: Singapore Entry Guide
info.subtitle: Visa-free for 30 days for Chinese passport holders

visa.title: ‚úì Great News! Visa-Free Policy
items: Since February 9, 2024, Chinese passport visa-free for 30 days - spontaneous travel!
‚Ä¢ No visa application needed in advance
‚Ä¢ Valid for tourism, family visits, business purposes
‚Ä¢ New requirement: SG Arrival Card must be submitted (submission time limit applies)

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Entry Information
items: ‚Ä¢ SG Arrival Card has time limit: Submit too early = invalid, too late = can't make it
‚Ä¢ Time calculation error-prone: Must calculate by Singapore time, timezone issues cause mistakes
‚Ä¢ Confirmation code easy to lose: Must show upon entry, can't find email is troublesome
‚Ä¢ High accuracy requirement: Any error in passport, flight, accommodation may affect entry
‚Ä¢ Immigration checks strict: Documents incomplete or answers unclear may trigger secondary inspection

appFeatures.title: ‚ú® BorderBuddy Makes It Easy
items: ‚Ä¢ Zero anxiety: Auto-tracks itinerary, reminds you at the perfect time
‚Ä¢ Zero errors: Smart-fill SG Arrival Card, accurate information
‚Ä¢ Zero hassle: Enter once, we manage the entire process
‚Ä¢ Confirmation management: Auto-save confirmation code, quick display upon entry

info.continueButton: Got it, continue to the checklist

requirements.introSubtitle: Fill in what you have and complete gradually

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport should be valid 6+ months beyond arrival
validPassport.details: Singapore recommends at least 6 months validity. Renew or replace damaged passports before travel.

submissionWindow.title: 3-day submission window
submissionWindow.description: Submit within 3 days before arrival (Singapore time, GMT+8)
submissionWindow.details: Submitting too early triggers an error. Set a reminder and complete SGAC when the countdown reaches the window.

travelDetails.title: Travel & stay information
travelDetails.description: Flight/entry checkpoint, accommodation/contact, purpose of visit
travelDetails.details: Prepare your airline/ferry/bus details, stay address, and an international-format phone number. Business travellers may need a local sponsor contact.

familyGroups.title: Family/group plan
familyGroups.description: Decide between individual or family submission
familyGroups.details: Family submission supports up to 10 travellers. Collect everyone‚Äôs passport details and confirm minors are linked to a guardian.

sgArrivalHistory.title: Previous submissions
sgArrivalHistory.description: Each SG Arrival Card is valid for a single entry
sgArrivalHistory.details: Re-entering soon? Submit a fresh declaration with updated travel details. Old submissions cannot be reused.

success.title: Great! You can proceed.
success.subtitle: Next we will confirm your travel information.

warning.subtitle: Complete the prerequisites before moving on.

ready.subtitle: Everything is complete‚Äîsubmit within the 3-day window.

visa.title: Visa Requirements
items: Chinese citizens can apply for e-Visa online
E-Visa valid for 90 days, single or multiple entry
Processing time: 3 business days
E-Visa fee: $25 USD

onsite.title: On-Site Requirements
items: Present your passport and approved e-Visa
Immigration form may be required on arrival
Customs declaration form for goods over $5,000 USD

appFeatures.title: App Features
items: ‚úÖ E-Visa application guidance
‚úÖ Entry form templates
‚úÖ Bilingual support (Vietnamese, English, Chinese)

requirements.introTitle: What You Need to Enter Vietnam
requirements.introSubtitle: Please ensure you have the following documents and requirements ready

validPassport.title: Valid Passport
validPassport.description: Passport must be valid for at least 6 months
validPassport.details: Your passport must have at least 6 months validity from your date of entry into Vietnam.

visa.title: E-Visa or Visa
visa.description: Apply for e-Visa online or obtain visa on arrival
visa.details: Chinese citizens can apply for e-Visa online (90 days validity) or obtain visa on arrival with pre-approval letter.

onwardTicket.title: Return or Onward Ticket
onwardTicket.details: You must show proof of onward or return travel (flight, bus, or train ticket).

accommodation.title: Accommodation Proof
accommodation.description: Hotel booking or address in Vietnam
accommodation.details: Provide hotel reservation or address of where you will stay in Vietnam.

funds.title: Sufficient Funds
funds.details: Be prepared to show proof of sufficient funds for your stay (cash, credit cards, or bank statements).

info.title: Hong Kong Entry Guide
info.subtitle: Visa-free for 7 days for Chinese passport holders

visa.title: ‚úì Great News! Visa-Free Policy
items: Chinese passport visa-free for 7 days - spontaneous travel!
‚Ä¢ No visa application needed in advance
‚Ä¢ Valid for tourism, business, family visits
‚Ä¢ Extensions can be applied through Hong Kong Immigration if needed

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Entry Information
items: ‚Ä¢ Short stay duration: Only 7 days, must leave on time or apply for extension
‚Ä¢ Immigration checks strict: May ask detailed questions about purpose, accommodation, funds
‚Ä¢ Document preparation required: Return ticket, hotel booking, funds proof all needed
‚Ä¢ Health declaration may required: Depending on current health policies
‚Ä¢ E-channels limited: First-time visitors must use manual counters, longer queues

appFeatures.title: ‚ú® BorderBuddy Makes It Easy
items: ‚Ä¢ Zero anxiety: Auto-reminds 7-day limit, no worries about overstay
‚Ä¢ Zero errors: Pre-filled travel information, immigration questions prepared
‚Ä¢ Zero hassle: Enter once, all documents organized
‚Ä¢ Document checklist: Comprehensive preparation list, no missing items

requirements.introSubtitle: Fill in what you have and complete gradually

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport should be valid for at least 1 month beyond your stay
validPassport.details: Hong Kong requires your passport to be valid beyond your intended stay. Check expiry date and renew if necessary.

returnTicket.title: Return or onward ticket
returnTicket.description: Confirmed booking for departure from Hong Kong
returnTicket.details: Immigration may ask to see proof of your return flight or onward journey. Have your e-ticket or booking confirmation ready.

accommodation.title: Accommodation proof
accommodation.description: Hotel booking or host contact information
accommodation.details: Bring hotel reservation confirmation or contact details of your host in Hong Kong, including address and phone number.

sufficientFunds.title: Sufficient funds
sufficientFunds.description: Cash, credit cards, or bank statements
sufficientFunds.details: You may need to demonstrate you have enough money for your stay. Bring cash, credit cards, or recent bank statements.

healthDeclaration.title: Health declaration
healthDeclaration.description: Complete if required by current health regulations
healthDeclaration.details: Check if health declarations or COVID-related documents are needed. Complete any required forms before arrival.

info.title: USA Entry Guide
info.subtitle: Chinese passport holders require a visa

visa.title: ‚úì Visa Policy
items: Visa required. Apply for a B1/B2 visa before travel.
‚Ä¢ Ten-year validity common, each stay usually up to 180 days
‚Ä¢ Covers tourism, visiting family, and business meetings
‚Ä¢ Important: EVUS registration must be valid before travel

important.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Key Entry Notes
items: ‚Ä¢ EVUS must stay valid: expired EVUS leads to denied boarding
‚Ä¢ CBP declaration is detailed: mistakes bring extra questioning
‚Ä¢ CBP interview pressure: language gaps or nervous answers impact decisions
‚Ä¢ Multiple systems to manage: EVUS, CBP declaration, I-94 history
‚Ä¢ Overstaying carries serious consequences for future visas

appFeatures.title: ‚ú® BorderBuddy Makes It Easy
items: ‚Ä¢ Zero anxiety: EVUS expiry reminders keep you on schedule
‚Ä¢ Zero errors: Smart-fill CBP customs declaration
‚Ä¢ Zero hassle: Enter once, manage everything in one hub
‚Ä¢ Interview prep: Common CBP questions to practise

requirements.introSubtitle: Fill what you have now, finish the rest later

validPassport.title: Valid passport
validPassport.description: At least 6 months validity beyond intended stay
validPassport.details: Ensure your passport is valid at least six months past your planned departure date.

validVisa.title: Valid US visa + EVUS
validVisa.description: B1/B2 visa with up-to-date EVUS registration
validVisa.details: A valid visa stamp and EVUS enrollment (renew every 2 years) are both required for boarding.

returnTicket.title: Return or onward ticket
returnTicket.details: Bring proof of departure such as a return ticket or onward itinerary.

sufficientFunds.title: Proof of funds
sufficientFunds.details: Bank statements, credit cards, or cash‚Äîanything that proves you can support your stay.

accommodation.title: Accommodation details
accommodation.details: Provide hotel confirmation or complete contact details of the friend/family hosting you.

info.title: Taiwan Entry Guide
info.subtitle: Entry permit required for Chinese passport holders

visa.title: ‚úì Entry Permit Policy
items: Chinese passport requires Entry Permit to Taiwan - apply online easily
‚Ä¢ Online application, about 5 business days processing
‚Ä¢ Valid for 3 months multiple entries, each stay up to 15 days
‚Ä¢ Also need to complete online arrival card before entry

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Entry Information
items: ‚Ä¢ Check permit validity: Expired or wrong dates = entry denied
‚Ä¢ Email verification required: Online card needs verification code, inaccessible email = can't complete
‚Ä¢ Complete documents preparation: Permit, return ticket, accommodation, funds proof all needed
‚Ä¢ Immigration questions detailed: May ask travel purpose, itinerary, contact info - prepare in advance
‚Ä¢ Entry permit easily lost: Paper or electronic copy must be carried, lost = big trouble

appFeatures.title: ‚ú® BorderBuddy Makes It Easy
items: ‚Ä¢ Zero anxiety: Reminds permit validity, auto-checks expiry
‚Ä¢ Zero errors: Smart-fill online arrival card, information accurate
‚Ä¢ Zero hassle: Enter once, we manage permits and cards
‚Ä¢ Document checklist: Comprehensive list, no missing items

requirements.introSubtitle: Fill in what you have and complete gradually

entryPermit.title: Entry Permit
entryPermit.details: Mainland Chinese travelers must obtain Entry Permit in advance. Single-entry valid 3 months, stay up to 15 days. Ensure permit is valid.

validPassport.title: Passport validity

steps.title: Request verification email
steps.subtitle: Confirm your email inbox is ready
details: Enter your email and tap "Send Code" on the official site.

steps.title: Travel history & confirmation

info.title: Japan Entry Guide
info.subtitle: Visa-free for 90 days for Chinese passport holders

visa.title: ‚úì Great News! Visa-Free Policy
items: Chinese passport holders can enjoy visa-free entry for 90 days - spontaneous travel!
‚Ä¢ No visa application needed in advance
‚Ä¢ Valid for tourism, family visits, business purposes
‚Ä¢ Paper arrival card still required on entry

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Entry Information
items: ‚Ä¢ Forms must be completed in black or blue ink.
‚Ä¢ Handwriting should be clear and legible.
‚Ä¢ Answer all questions truthfully on customs forms.
‚Ä¢ Keep your entry card stub until departure.
‚Ä¢ Biometric scanning (fingerprint/face) is required.

appFeatures.title: ‚ú® BorderBuddy Makes It Easy
items: ‚Ä¢ Zero anxiety: Auto-reminds about form completion and biometric step.
‚Ä¢ Zero errors: Copy Mode ensures accurate data transfer to paper forms.
‚Ä¢ Zero hassle: Detailed step-by-step guide for the entire process.
‚Ä¢ Document checklist: Comprehensive preparation list for immigration/customs.

requirements.introSubtitle: Fill in what you have and complete gradually

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport valid for your intended stay
validPassport.details: Ensure passport is valid for the duration of your stay. Renew if expiry is near.

visaFreeEntry.title: Visa-free entry status
visaFreeEntry.details: China passport holders can enter Japan visa-free for up to 90 days. Keep your passport valid for at least 6 months and carry supporting documents in case immigration asks for proof.

onwardTicket.title: Onward or return ticket
onwardTicket.details: Have a printed or digital copy of your return flight or onward journey. Officers often verify your departure plan at the counter.

funds.title: Proof of funds
funds.description: Show you can afford the trip
funds.details: Prepare bank statements, cash (recommended ¬•100,000 or more), or international credit cards to demonstrate sufficient travel funds.

accommodation.title: Accommodation confirmation
accommodation.details: Bring hotel confirmations or the address and phone number of friends/family you will stay with. Immigration may ask you to write this on the arrival card.

paperArrivalCard.title: Paper arrival card + customs form
paperArrivalCard.description: Fill in forms on the plane or at the counter
paperArrivalCard.details: Japan still requires handwritten arrival and customs cards. Use black or blue ink and double-check information before submission.

stepProgress.title: Entry Steps Progress
stepProgress.noStepsDescription: Please ensure the configuration supplies the expected steps.

pikGuide.title: Primary Inspection Kiosk (PIK) Operation Guide
pikGuide.subtitle: Primary Inspection Kiosk (PIK)
pikGuide.description: Canada's border self-service kiosk is simple. Just follow this guide step by step.

step1.title: Find the Self-Service Kiosk
step1.description:
After getting off the plane, follow the "Arrivals" or "ÂÖ•Â¢É" signs.

Enter the arrival hall and look for machines with large screens.

Usually there are many machines in a row, similar in size to ATM machines.

step2.title: Select Chinese
step2.description:
The screen will display language options.

Tap "‰∏≠Êñá" or "Chinese" with your finger.

‚ö†Ô∏è If you can't find Chinese, selecting "English" is fine. The following steps all have picture prompts.

step3.title: Scan Passport
step3.description:
Open your passport to the page with your photo (photo page).

Place the passport flat with the photo facing down.

Place it on the scanner below the machine (like a copier).

When you hear a "beep" or the screen shows "‚úì", the scan is successful.

pikGuide.step3Tip: Tip: Keep the passport flat, don't bend it. If scanning fails, just place it again.

step4.title: Answer Questions
step4.description:
The screen will display several questions.

Each question has "Yes/YES" and "No/NO" buttons below.

Tap the corresponding button with your finger based on the answers below:

pikGuide.step4Warning: Important: Answer truthfully! If you answer "Yes", you may need additional checks, but there won't be any trouble.

step5.title: Take Receipt
step5.description:
After answering all questions, the machine will print a small slip.

The receipt will come out from below or the side of the machine.

‚ö†Ô∏è Be sure to keep this receipt!

You'll need to give it to the customs officer later.

step6.title: Go to Manual Counter
step6.description:
Take your passport and the receipt you just printed.

Follow the crowd and queue up to the manual counter.

Give the receipt and passport together to the customs officer.

The officer may ask a few simple questions:
‚Ä¢ What are you doing in Canada? (Tourism)
‚Ä¢ Where are you staying? (Hotel name)
‚Ä¢ How long are you staying? (A few days)

‚úÖ Done! Welcome to Canada

pikGuide.helpTitle: What if I don't know how to operate it?

helpOption1.title: Ask Staff for Help
helpOption1.description:
There are usually uniformed staff near the machines.
Say to them: "I need help"
They will help you operate it.

helpOption2.title: Ask Chinese Travelers for Help
helpOption2.description: If there are Chinese travelers nearby, you can ask them for help. Everyone is happy to help fellow countrymen.

helpOption3.title: Go to Manual Counter
helpOption3.description:
If you really don't know how to use the machine, go directly to the manual counter.
Although it's slower, you can still enter the country.
Just show the officer your passport and the form on your phone.

pikGuide.reassuranceTitle: Don't worry! No need to be nervous
pikGuide.reassuranceText:
‚Ä¢ Canadian border officers are very friendly and won't give you trouble

‚Ä¢ Many airports have Chinese service or Chinese interpreters

‚Ä¢ Even if you can't use the machine, you can use the manual channel

‚Ä¢ Millions of Chinese tourists enter Canada every year, all smoothly

Most importantly: Answer questions honestly and don't carry prohibited items

helpKiosk.en: I need help with the kiosk.

customsQuestions.currencyOverLimit: Are you bringing currency or monetary instruments totaling CAN$10,000 or more?
customsQuestions.foodAnimals: Are you bringing food, plants, animals, or related products?
customsQuestions.visitedFarm: Have you visited a farm or been in contact with farm animals?
customsQuestions.commercialGoods: Are you bringing commercial goods, samples, or goods for resale?
customsQuestions.firearms: Are you bringing firearms or weapons?
customsQuestions.dutyFree: Are you bringing goods that exceed your duty-free allowance?
